test_cases.test_name: Configured Stability Study Manager - Protocol Configuration
test_cases.objective: Verify that the stability study management module can correctly configure product, lot, storage condition, and pull schedules as per URS-023-001.
prerequisites: Access to stability study management module

test_steps.action: Log in to the stability study management module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the module.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the protocol configuration section.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol configuration section is accessible.

test_steps.action: Configure a new stability study protocol with product, lot, storage condition, and pull schedules.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully configured and saved.

acceptance_criteria: Protocol configuration is saved without errors
All configured fields are correctly populated
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all configured data is accurately stored

test_cases.test_name: Configured Stability Study Manager - Pull List Generation
test_cases.objective: Verify that the stability study management module can generate pull lists for 500 samples in less than 5 seconds as per URS-023-010.
prerequisites: Access to stability study management module

test_steps.action: Log in to the stability study management module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the module.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the pull list generation section.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list generation section is accessible.

test_steps.action: Generate a pull list for 500 samples.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list is generated in less than 5 seconds.
data_to_capture: Time taken to generate pull list

acceptance_criteria: Pull list is generated in less than 5 seconds
Pull list contains all 500 samples
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all pull list data is accurately generated

test_cases.test_name: Verify Stability Study Manager Configuration
test_cases.objective: To verify that the Stability Study Manager is correctly configured to define protocols, pull schedules, and reporting templates.

test_steps.action: Log in to the Stability Study Manager system.
test_steps.expected_result: Successful login with appropriate user permissions.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the protocol configuration section.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol configuration section is accessible.

test_steps.action: Configure a new protocol with product, lot, storage condition, and pull schedules.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully configured and saved.

test_steps.action: Generate a pull list using the configured template.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list is generated correctly and matches the configured schedule.

acceptance_criteria: Protocol configuration is saved successfully.
Pull list matches the configured schedule.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all configurations are logged in the audit trail.

test_cases.test_name: Validate Stability Study Manager Integration with LIMS and WMS
test_cases.objective: To validate the integration of the Stability Study Manager with LIMS and WMS via standard APIs.

test_steps.action: Log in to the Stability Study Manager system.
test_steps.expected_result: Successful login with appropriate user permissions.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the integration settings section.
test_steps.expected_result: Integration settings section is accessible.

test_steps.action: Configure the integration with LIMS and WMS using standard APIs.
test_steps.expected_result: Integration settings are successfully configured and saved.

test_steps.action: Test the data exchange between Stability Study Manager and LIMS/WMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully exchanged between systems without errors.

acceptance_criteria: Integration settings are saved successfully.
Data exchange between systems is successful.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data exchanges are logged in the audit trail.

test_cases.test_name: Stability Study Pull List Generation Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system can generate a pull list for 500 samples in less than 5 seconds as per URS-023-010.
prerequisites: System is configured with at least 500 stability samples

test_steps.action: Navigate to the pull list generation module in the Stability Study Manager.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list generation interface is accessible.
data_to_capture: Time taken to load the interface

test_steps.action: Select 500 samples and initiate the pull list generation.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list is generated successfully.
data_to_capture: Time taken to generate the pull list

acceptance_criteria: Pull list is generated in less than 5 seconds.
All selected samples are included in the pull list.
data_integrity_requirements: ALCOA+ principles must be maintained

test_cases.test_name: Stability Study Method Version Control Verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure that the system enforces method-version control for stability tests as per URS-023-003.
prerequisites: System is configured with at least one stability study
Multiple versions of a test method are available

test_steps.action: Navigate to the stability study protocol and attempt to assign an outdated test method version.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents assignment of outdated method versions.

test_steps.action: Assign the latest approved method version to the stability study.
test_steps.expected_result: Latest method version is successfully assigned.

acceptance_criteria: System enforces use of current approved method versions.
Audit trail records method version assignments.
data_integrity_requirements: ALCOA+ principles must be maintained

test_cases.test_name: Integration with LIMS and WMS via Standard APIs
test_cases.objective: Verify the system's ability to integrate with LIMS and WMS using standard APIs for seamless data exchange.

test_steps.action: Configure API endpoints for LIMS and WMS in the stability study manager.
test_steps.expected_result: API endpoints are successfully configured and validated.

test_steps.action: Send a test data packet from the stability study manager to LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully received and processed by LIMS.

test_steps.action: Retrieve a sample record from WMS via the configured API.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample record is successfully retrieved and displayed in the stability study manager.

acceptance_criteria: Data exchange between systems is seamless and accurate.
API configurations are validated and functional.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission.
Maintain audit trail for API transactions.

test_cases.test_name: Performance Test for Pull List Generation
test_cases.objective: Validate the system's ability to generate a pull list for 500 samples in less than 5 seconds.
prerequisites: 500 sample records available in the system

test_steps.action: Initiate the pull list generation process for 500 samples.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list is generated successfully within 5 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify the accuracy of the generated pull list.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list contains all 500 samples with correct details.

acceptance_criteria: Pull list is generated in less than 5 seconds.
Pull list is accurate and complete.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data accuracy in the pull list.
Maintain audit trail for pull list generation.

test_cases.test_name: Verify Stability Study Manager Configuration
test_cases.objective: To verify that the Stability Study Manager is correctly configured to manage product, lot, storage condition, and pull schedules as per URS-023-001.

test_steps.action: Log in to the Stability Study Manager.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the main dashboard.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the configuration section and select a product.
test_steps.expected_result: Product details are displayed correctly.

test_steps.action: Configure a new stability study with a specific lot and storage condition.
test_steps.expected_result: Stability study is successfully configured and saved.

test_steps.action: Set up a pull schedule for the configured study.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull schedule is correctly set up and displayed.

acceptance_criteria: Stability study configuration is verified and matches the URS requirements.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all configurations are accurately recorded and traceable.

test_cases.test_name: Validate Pull List Generation
test_cases.objective: To validate that the Stability Study Manager can generate pull lists for 500 samples in less than 5 seconds as per URS-023-010.

test_steps.action: Log in to the Stability Study Manager.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the main dashboard.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the pull list generation section.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list generation interface is displayed.

test_steps.action: Select the configured stability study with 500 samples.
test_steps.expected_result: Study details are displayed correctly.

test_steps.action: Generate the pull list.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list is generated in less than 5 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Pull list is generated within the specified time frame.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure pull list data is accurate and complete.

test_cases.test_name: Verify Stability Study Protocol Configuration
test_cases.objective: To ensure that the stability study management module correctly configures protocols, including product, lot, storage condition, and pull schedules.

test_steps.action: Log in to the stability study management module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the module.

test_steps.action: Create a new stability study protocol using the configured templates.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is created with all specified parameters (product, lot, storage condition, pull schedules).

test_steps.action: Save and submit the protocol for approval.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is saved and submitted successfully, triggering the approval workflow.

acceptance_criteria: Protocol is configured correctly and submitted for approval without errors.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all protocol data is accurately captured and stored.

test_cases.test_name: Validate Pull List Generation and Chain-of-Custody Forms
test_cases.objective: To verify that the system correctly generates pull lists and chain-of-custody forms based on configured templates.
prerequisites: Access to pull list generation module

test_steps.action: Log in to the stability study management module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the module.

test_steps.action: Select a configured stability study protocol and generate a pull list.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list is generated correctly based on the protocol's pull schedule.

test_steps.action: Generate a chain-of-custody form from the pull list.
test_steps.expected_result: Chain-of-custody form is generated correctly and matches the pull list.

acceptance_criteria: Pull list and chain-of-custody forms are generated correctly and match the protocol's pull schedule.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all pull list and form data is accurately captured and stored.

test_cases.test_name: Verify Stability Study Manager Configuration
test_cases.objective: To verify that the Stability Study Manager is correctly configured to define protocols, pull schedules, and reporting templates.
prerequisites: Access to the Stability Study Manager module

test_steps.action: Log in to the Stability Study Manager module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the module.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the protocol configuration section.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol configuration section is accessible.

test_steps.action: Configure a new protocol with product, lot, storage condition, and pull schedules.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully configured and saved.

test_steps.action: Generate a pull list using the configured template.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list is generated and displayed correctly.

acceptance_criteria: Protocol configuration is saved correctly
Pull list is generated accurately
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all configurations are saved with ALCOA+ audit trail

test_cases.test_name: Verify Integration with LIMS and WMS
test_cases.objective: To verify that the Stability Study Manager integrates correctly with LIMS and WMS via standard APIs.

test_steps.action: Log in to the Stability Study Manager module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the module.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the integration settings section.
test_steps.expected_result: Integration settings section is accessible.

test_steps.action: Configure API endpoints for LIMS and WMS integration.

test_steps.action: Test data exchange between Stability Study Manager and LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully exchanged between systems.

test_cases.test_name: Verify Stability Study Protocol Configuration
test_cases.objective: To ensure that the stability study management module correctly configures product, lot, storage condition, and pull schedules as per URS-023-001.
prerequisites: Access to configured stability study management module

test_steps.action: Log in to the stability study management module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the module.

test_steps.action: Configure a new stability study protocol with product, lot, storage condition, and pull schedules.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully configured and saved in the system.

test_steps.action: Verify the configured protocol details.
test_steps.expected_result: All configured details match the input data.

Protocol is saved without errors

test_cases.test_name: Validate Pull List Generation
test_cases.objective: To verify that the system generates pull lists and chain-of-custody forms from configured templates as per URS-023-002.

test_steps.action: Log in to the stability study management module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the module.

test_steps.action: Generate a pull list for a configured stability study protocol.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list is successfully generated and displayed.

test_steps.action: Verify the generated pull list against the configured template.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list matches the configured template and includes all required details.

acceptance_criteria: Pull list is generated without errors
Pull list matches configured template
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all pull list data is accurately captured and stored

test_cases.test_name: Stability Study Pull List Generation Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Verify the system can generate a pull list for 500 samples in less than 5 seconds as per URS-023-010.
prerequisites: Configured stability study with at least 500 active samples
Access to the stability study management module

test_steps.action: Navigate to the pull list generation section of the stability study management module.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list generation interface is accessible and functional.
data_to_capture: Time taken to load the interface

test_steps.action: Select 500 samples and initiate the pull list generation process.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list is generated successfully.
data_to_capture: Time taken to generate the pull list

acceptance_criteria: Pull list is generated in less than 5 seconds.
All selected samples are included in the pull list.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all sample data is accurately reflected in the pull list.

test_cases.test_name: Stability Study Chamber Conditions Integration Test
test_cases.objective: Verify the system correctly receives and processes chamber conditions from the EMS as per URS-023-012.
prerequisites: Configured integration between stability study management and EMS
Active chamber conditions data in EMS

test_steps.action: Simulate a chamber condition update in the EMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Chamber condition update is sent to the stability study management system.

test_steps.action: Check the stability study management system for the updated chamber conditions.
test_steps.expected_result: Updated chamber conditions are displayed correctly in the stability study management system.
data_to_capture: Timestamp of update in stability system

acceptance_criteria: Chamber conditions are updated in the stability study management system within 1 minute of EMS update.
All chamber condition data is accurately reflected.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure chamber condition data is accurately transferred and displayed.

test_cases.test_name: Verify Stability Study Manager Configuration
test_cases.objective: To verify that the Stability Study Manager is correctly configured to define protocols, pull schedules, and reporting templates.

test_steps.action: Log in to the Stability Study Manager with valid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and the main dashboard is displayed.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the protocol configuration section and define a new protocol.
test_steps.expected_result: New protocol is successfully created and saved in the system.

test_steps.action: Generate a pull list using the configured template.
test_steps.expected_result: Pull list is generated and displayed correctly.

acceptance_criteria: Protocol is correctly configured and saved.
Pull list is generated accurately.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data entries are accurate and traceable.

test_cases.test_name: Validate Stability Study Manager Integration
test_cases.objective: To validate the integration of the Stability Study Manager with LIMS and WMS via standard APIs.

test_steps.action: Log in to the Stability Study Manager with valid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and the main dashboard is displayed.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the integration settings and configure the LIMS and WMS APIs.
test_steps.expected_result: APIs are successfully configured and connected.

test_steps.action: Send a test data request from the Stability Study Manager to LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully received and processed by LIMS.

acceptance_criteria: APIs are correctly configured and connected.
Data is successfully transferred between systems.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data transfers are accurate and traceable.
